original_text: They wanted to ask Jesus a question. ‘Teacher,’ they said to him, ‘Moses wrote this in the Bible for us: “A man may die and leave a wife but no children. Then that man's brother must marry the woman. Then their children will be called the children of the brother who died.”
korean_text: 물어 이르되 선생님이여 모세가 우리에게 써 주기를 만일 어떤 사람의 형이 아내를 두고 자식이 없이 죽으면 그 동생이 그 아내를 취하여 형을 위하여 상속자를 세울지니라 하였나이다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to ask Jesus a question.
'Moses wrote this in the Bible for us:
A man may die and leave a wife
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 죽고 아내를 남길 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Then that man's brother must marry the woman.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 남자의 형제가 그 여자와 결혼해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Then their children will be called
the children of the brother who died.
